means: 世界一周旅行，周游世界

sentence.Network_en: He married in Fiji during a two-year circumnavigation of the globe in his yacht, Surma.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在驾驶“祖尔马”号游艇进行为期两年的环球航行途中，在斐济结了婚。

sentence.Network_en: How to plan a slow travel, low - carbon global circumnavigation?
sentence.Network_cn: 怎样来计划一个慢速旅行, 低碳 环球旅行会是什么样?

sentence.Network_en: Magellan's circumnavigation of the earth proved that it is a globe.
sentence.Network_cn: 麦哲伦周游世界的事实说明地球是圆的.

entry.def: If someone circumnavigates the world or an island, they sail all the way around it.

example.ex: For this year at least, our race to circumnavigate the globe in less than 80 days is over.
example.tran: 至少今年，我们80天内环游地球一周的比赛已经结束了。

means.word_mean: 1. traveling around something (by ship or plane);

sentences.sentence: "Magellan's circumnavigation of the earth proved that it is a globe"

auth_sentence.content: Fiennes was part of a two-man team who achieved the first circumnavigation of the globe via both poles.
auth_sentence.res_content: Fiennes was part of a two-man team who achieved the first circumnavigation of the globe via both poles.
